title: Easydict for Windows
shortDescription: Easy to look up words or translate text
description:
Easydict for Windows is a free and open-source translation and dictionary tool that provides instant access to 18 translation services. The full source code is available on GitHub under the GPL-3.0 license. Whether you need quick word lookups, full-text translation, or AI-powered translations with real-time streaming, Easydict has you covered.

A Windows port of the popular macOS Easydict app, built with modern .NET and WinUI 3 technologies for a native Windows experience.

Key Highlights:

- 18 Translation Services: Google Translate, Google Dict, Bing Translate, DeepL, OpenAI, Gemini, DeepSeek, Groq, Zhipu AI, GitHub Models, Doubao, Volcano Engine, Caiyun, NiuTrans, Linguee, Ollama, and more
- AI-Powered Streaming: Watch LLM translations appear in real-time as they're generated
- Multiple Window Modes: Full main window, compact mini window, or persistent fixed window
- Mouse Selection Translation: Select text anywhere and click the floating pop button to translate instantly
- Global Hotkeys: Translate from anywhere with customizable keyboard shortcuts
- System Tray: Runs quietly in the background, always ready when you need it
- Clipboard Monitoring: Automatically translate copied text
- Dark/Light Theme: Follows your Windows system theme
- Text-to-Speech: Listen to source and translated text
- High DPI Support: Crystal clear on any display

Perfect for students, professionals, translators, and anyone who needs quick, reliable translations across multiple languages.
